Collect stool specimen.sentence: The healthcare provider explains the stool specimen collection procedure to the patient.
Collect stool specimen.subject: The healthcare provider

Collect stool specimen.sentence: The patient collects the stool sample using the provided collection container.
Collect stool specimen.subject: The patient

Collect stool specimen.sentence: The patient seals the collection container securely after obtaining the stool sample.
Collect stool specimen.subject: The patient

Collect stool specimen.sentence: The patient labels the collection container with their name and date of collection.
Collect stool specimen.subject: The patient

Collect stool specimen.sentence: The patient returns the labeled collection container to the healthcare provider for analysis.
Collect stool specimen.subject: The patient
